author: wn.com
title: Health official plans reform to stop price hike on pharmaceutical drugs (Beijing Municipal Government)
text: ( Source : Beijing Municipal Government ) Feng Guosheng, chief of Beijing Municipal Administration of Hospitals announced further reforms to reduce the price of drugs sold in hospitals. A key measure of the reforms, currently under way in many
